inputs.name: newAppellate
inputs.description: address of entity that will be made the Appellate

abiDocs.name: setAppellate
abiDocs.notice: sets a new Appellate address (entity that is allowed to grant appeals and modify appeal parameters)

abiDocs.name: getAppellate
abiDocs.notice: Returns the address of the entity that acts as an Appellate. The Appellate can modify Appeals parameters (via the `set` function)

abiDocs.name: getGovernmentController
abiDocs.notice: Returns the address of the entity that controls this Government. The Government controller can set the Appellate.

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: the key whose value is to be determined

abiDocs.name: get
abiDocs.notice: gets the parameter keyed by the provided name value from the params mapping

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: the name of the param to be set

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: the value to set the param to be set

abiDocs.name: set
abiDocs.notice: sets the param keyed by the provided name to the provided value. Can only be called by the Appellate.
